DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effect Dosing AZD6244 HydSulfate Presence Absence Food Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Able eat high fat breakfast within 30minute period Advanced cancer refractory standard therapy , standard therapy exist WHO ECOG performance status 02 ( performance status 2 must stable deterioration 2 week ) Any radiotherapy chemotherapy within 21 day prior start study treatment ( include palliative radiotherapy focal site ) . Any evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( eg. , severe hepatic impairment , severe renal impairment , uncontrolled diabetes , acute uncontrolled infection ) current unstable uncompensated respiratory cardiac condition peripheral vascular disease include diabetic vasculopathy . Refractory nausea vomiting , chronic GI disease ( eg. , inflammatory bowel disease ) significant bowel resection would preclude adequate absorption .
